When did Anders Celcius publish his observations on the aurora borealis?	1733
When did Anders Celcius publish his observations on the aurora borealis?	1733

What did Anders Celsius determine about the boiling of water?	He determined the dependence of the boiling of water with atmospheric pressure.
What did Anders Celsius determine about the boiling of water?	dependence with atmospheric pressure
Which temperature scale did Celsius propose?	Celcius
Which temperature scale did Celsius propose?	 the Celsius temperature scale 
What is the boiling point of water dependent on?	atmospheric pressure
What is the boiling point of water dependent on?	atmospheric pressure
Where was Celsius born?	Uppsala in Sweden
Where was Celsius born?	Uppsala, Sweden
Whad did Celsius report in his paper "Observations of two persistent degrees on a thermometer"?	the freezing point is independent of latitude
How old was Celsius when he died?	42
How old was Celsius when he died?	42
What is temperature would water have to be to be halfway between its standard boiling and freezing point?	50
What is the difference between Celsius' original temperature scale and the one we use today?	The scale was reversed by Carolus Linnaeus. 
What is the difference between Celsius' original temperature scale and the one we use today?	scale was reversed 
What was Anders Celsius`s profession?	professor of astronomy
How old was Anders Celsius when he died?	42
What is Anders Celsius`s last name?	Celsius
Was celsius born in Uppsala  in Sweden?	yes
Is The Celsius  crater  on the Moon named after him?	yes
Was Anders Celsius  ( November 27 ,  1701  April 25 ,  1744  ) a Swedish  astronomer?	yes
Was Anders Celsius the first  to perform  and  publish  careful experiments  aiming at the definition  of an international  temperature  scale  on scientific grounds?	yes
Was he professor at Uppsala University?	yes
Is it true that he published a collection of 316 observations?	yes
He published a collection of what?	observations
